name: Call Of Ohio: Zesty Warfare: Zombies
name_original: Call Of Ohio: Zesty Warfare: Zombies
description:
Java 17+ Must Be Downloaded to play, which can be downloaded here.
If you get an error like `java version mismatch`, you must download an updated version of java here.

The original Call of Duty: Zombies game was reimagined for a 2D top-down survival game all made in LWJGL. This game is one-of-a-kind and is quite hard in the later stages so good luck.
